title.en: 5Toubun no Hanayome - Magical Girl Raiha with The Quintuplet of Witch

description.en:
Upon meeting [i]The Quintuplets of Witches[/i] in an unexpected turn of events, Uesugi Raiha, who lives with her father and her black cat Fuutarou, became [i]Magical Girl Raiha[/i] - the protector of peace in her city?!

From The Official 5Toubun Anime Twitter: [url=https://twitter.com/5Hanayome_anime/status/1112369316735774721]@5Hanayome_anime[/url]
[hr][b]Raws:[/b]  [url=https://twitter.com/5Hanayome_anime/status/1112369645548244993]Raiha[/url]  [url=https://twitter.com/5Hanayome_anime/status/1112370191214608385]Fuutarou[/url]  [url=https://twitter.com/5Hanayome_anime/status/1112370643402555392]Ichika[/url]  [url=https://twitter.com/5Hanayome_anime/status/1112371089844260867]Nino[/url]  [url=https://twitter.com/5Hanayome_anime/status/1112371441972838400]Miku[/url]  [url=https://twitter.com/5Hanayome_anime/status/1112371772697903106]Yotsuba[/url]  [url=https://twitter.com/5Hanayome_anime/status/1112372104802885632]Itsuki[/url]
